translations.translation: and what you do not see,
And what you do not see,
and by what you do not see,
and what you do not see
And by oath of those you do not see.
And by whatsoever you see not,
And that which you do not see.
and by that you do not see,
And all that ye see not
as well as all that you cannot see:
And that which ye see not.
and what you do not see:
And by whatsoever you see not,
and all that you do not see,
And by what you do not see.
And what you do not see
[69:39] and all that you do not see: of them, in other words, [I swear] by all creatures:

And all that ye see not) people of Mecca; it is also said that this means: I swear by what you see, i.e. the sky and the earth, and that which you do not see, i.e. the Garden and the Fire; and it also said that this means: I swear by what you see, the sun and the moon, and by that which you do not see, the Throne and the Stool; and it is also said that this means: I swear by what you see, i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) and that which you do not see, Gabriel. Allah swore by all these.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ وَمَا لاَ تُبْصِرُونَ } [الحاقة: 39] منها من المقسمات التي نُطلع أحداً عليها
 فعليم أيها المكلفون أن تتوجهوا إلى القرآن المنزل عليكم على سبيل التبيان والبيان فتعتقدوا جميع ما فيه حقاً صدقاً
 وتمتثلوا بأوامره
 وتجتنبوا عن نواهيه

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text:
{ وما لا تُبصرون } مما هو في عالم الغيب
 أو بما تُبصرون من الأرض والسماء
 والأجسام والأجرام
 وما لا تُبصرون من الملائكة والأرواح
 أو: ما تُبصرون من النعم الظاهرة
 وما لا تُبصرون من النِعَم الباطنة
